display_long_description:
Discover a new way to experience stories with Grupo Elo Editorial VR, where virtual reality transforms books into magical adventures.

In our Immersive VR Universe, you’ll find shelves filled with interactive books. Using your controllers or hands, choose a title and step inside — you’ll be transported into the story, where the book’s author will appear before you to personally invite you into their work. Technology is our greatest ally in inspiring a love for reading.

Watch 3D animated scenes where characters come to life, speaking, moving, and interacting with the environment around you. It’s like stepping inside the book’s world and becoming part of the story.

Perfect for parents and children, teachers, and anyone who wants to encourage reading in a fun and innovative way, Grupo Elo Editorial VR combines literature, imagination, and technology to create unforgettable moments and spark a passion for books.
